articles.author: Dakin Andone and Michelle Watson, CNN
articles.title: Oregon's Rum Creek wildfire nearly doubles in size to more than 8,000 acres
articles.description: A wildfire burning in southwest Oregon has grown to 8,404 acres, according to a Sunday update by fire officials, nearly double the acreage the blaze had consumed a day prior.
articles.content:
(CNN)A wildfire burning in southwest Oregon has grown to 8,404 acres, according to a Sunday update by fire officials, nearly double the acreage the blaze had consumed a day prior.

articles.description: Dinosaur tracks from around 113 million years ago have been revealed at Dinosaur Valley State Park in Texas due to severe drought conditions that dried up a river. Park superintendent Jeff Davis explains the type of dinosaur -- an Acrocanthosaurus -- that lef…

articles.title: CNN examines how local water departments are cracking down in California  - CNN Video
articles.description: With the lack of water entering California, residents are restricted on the amount of water they can consume. The Las Virgenes Municipal Water District is on the lookout for anyone breaking those rules. CNN's Stephanie Elam rides along with the "water police"…

articles.title: The fight against drought in California has a new tool: The restrictor

articles.title: A once-bullish GOP now sees a smaller House majority in its future, presenting a challenge to McCarthy

articles.title: Crist urges Democratic donors to help stop DeSantis before he becomes too powerful. But Florida is a tough sell

articles.title: 'Get out now': Mayor urges residents to flee ahead of rising river waters in Mississippi
articles.description: The mayor of Mississippi's biggest city urged residents to "get out now" on Saturday as record-setting rain threatens to flood streets and creep into homes within the next two days.

articles.author: Analysis by Clare Sebastian, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: 'Slower burn.' Russia dodges economic collapse but the decline has started
articles.description: Six months after invading Ukraine, Russia is bogged down in a war of attrition it didn't anticipate but it is having success on another front — its oil-dependent economy is in a deep recession but proving far more resilient than expected.

articles.author: Julia Buckley, CNN
articles.title: Sewage-covered beaches risk turning England into the 'dirty man of Europe'
articles.description: Last week, 100 English beaches were closed due to spills of raw sewage. But these aren't accidents -- water companies are releasing excess wastewater into rivers and seas, making the UK the 'dirty man of Europe.'
articles.content:
(CNN) Near the southwest tip of England, where the region of Cornwall meets the Atlantic, is Longrock Beach.

articles.title: Artemis I in numbers
articles.description: Almost 50 years later, NASA is ready to return humans to the lunar surface -- and it begins with the Artemis I mission. Here are the big numbers that make the mission a monumental feat.
